resources.string: This thing comes fully loaded. AM/FM radio, reclining bucket seats, and… power windows. Jaguar shark! So tell me - does it really exist? Life finds a way. They\'re using our own satellites against us. And the clock is ticking. God help us, we\'re in the hands of engineers.

God creates dinosaurs. God destroys dinosaurs. God creates Man. Man destroys God. Man creates Dinosaurs. So you two dig up, dig up dinosaurs? Yes, Yes, without the oops! Must go faster… go, go, go, go, go! Is this my espresso machine? Wh-what is-h-how did you get my espresso machine?
